item.title: Siemens Ltd Gains 2.48%: 7 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Volatility
item.description: Siemens Ltd delivered a solid weekly performance, rising 2.48% from Rs.3,100.20 to Rs.3,177.20 between 2 and 6 February 2026, outpacing the Sensex’s 1.51% gain over the same period. The stock showed strong intraday rallies early in the week, supported by rising open interest and technical momentum, before facing profit-taking pressures on the final trading day amid mixed market signals and a recent fundamental downgrade. Time: 53 minutes ago

item.title: Hikal Ltd Falls 6.94% Amidst Persistent Downtrend and Volatile Week
item.description: Hikal Ltd’s shares declined by 6.94% over the week ending 6 February 2026, closing at Rs.179.55, significantly underperforming the Sensex which gained 1.51% during the same period. The stock hit fresh 52-week lows twice this week amid continued financial pressures and weak earnings, despite a brief intraday recovery on 3 February. This review analyses the key events and market dynamics shaping Hikal’s performance over the past five trading sessions. Time: 53 minutes ago

item.title: Vaibhav Global Ltd Gains 1.56%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Volatility
